issues.message:
Outbound network request depends on [file data](1).
Outbound network request depends on [file data](2).
Outbound network request depends on [file data](3).

rule.name: js/file-access-to-http
rule.short_description: File data in outbound network request
rule.full_description: Directly sending file data in an outbound network request can indicate unauthorized information disclosure.

issues.message: The file may have changed since it [was checked](1).

rule.name: js/file-system-race
rule.full_description: Separately checking the state of a file before operating on it may allow an attacker to modify the file between the two operations.

issues.message: The file may have changed since it [was checked](1).

rule.name: js/file-system-race
rule.full_description: Separately checking the state of a file before operating on it may allow an attacker to modify the file between the two operations.

issues.message:
This command depends on an unsanitized [environment variable](1).
This command depends on an unsanitized [environment variable](2).

rule.name: js/indirect-command-line-injection
rule.full_description: Forwarding command-line arguments to a child process executed within a shell may indirectly introduce command-line injection vulnerabilities.
